overview: In 1981, Jean Van Halsing has been studying the legend of the Prince of Darkness, Count Dracula, for five years. As chance would have it, this legendary figure ends up in his neighborhood of all places and instigates a lot of trouble full of bites and throat bites. Over the next years they will meet again and again without finding a solution for each other or even for themselves. Will the nasty cycle ever come to an end?
title: Graf Dracula Junior
